prompt.content: How did S&P Global Inc (NYSE: SPGI)'s diluted GAAP EPS compare to management projections (at midpoint) on an annual basis in 2024? Format as % BEAT or MISS and express answer with two decimal points. Use guidance provided on an annual basis.

messages.content: [{"criteria":"Find that the FY 2024 diluted GAAP EPS is $12.35 per share","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find that the most recent guidance for FY 2024 is from Q3 2024 press release.","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Find that the FY 2024 annual GAAP diluted EPS guidance range reported in Q3 2024 is from $11.95 to $12.15","operator":"correctness"},{"criteria":"Calculate the midpoint of the guidance to be $12.05 per share","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Calculate the difference between actual guidance and the midpoint: (12.35/12.05)-1 = 2.49%"},{"criteria":"Since the difference is positive this is a BEAT","operator":"correctness"},{"operator":"correctness","criteria":"Round final answer to two decimal points and use given format: 2.49% BEAT"}]
